I'm not rich, but I do take care of my health.
I'll be inside cleaning and my dogs will be outside playing in the fresh air.
I'm not a weather person.

content.text: Hey, I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks for asking!
That's good to hear! What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out with my dogs. They're the best companions and make me laugh every day.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love dogs. I have two of my own.
Oh cool! What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a pit bull.
Oh wow, that's a great mix! I bet they're both really cute.
They are! The golden retriever is really gentle and loving, and the pit bull is more playful and energetic.
That sounds like a great combination. I'm sure they're both great pets.
They are! I'm so glad I have them.
I'm glad to hear that! What are your favorite things to do with your dogs?
I love to take them for walks in the park, play fetch in the backyard, and go camping with them.
Oh wow, that sounds like so much fun! I bet they love going camping with you.
They do! They love to explore new places and run around.
That's great! I'm glad they have such a great owner.
Thank you! I'm glad to have them in my life.
